isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 3200, 4100, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500, 8600 Models Built After 05/19/2003 - LIGHT SYSTEMS - WORK LIGHTS

svcproc.title: CIRCUIT FUNCTIONS

calloutgroup.callout1: 5. WORK LIGHT SWITCH (IN 3 SWITCH PACK ON EGC)

svcproc.para: Refer to the Work Light Function Diagram.
The work light illuminates the fifth wheel area for easier trailer hook-up.

The momentary work light switch is wired directly to the EGC circuit board. When the work light momentary switch is pushed "on" the electronic gauge cluster will send a message to the ESC, on the drivetrain 1939 data link, to command the light on and light the switch indicator. The ESC provides power to the work light. When the switch is pushed "off", the ESC will turn the light off.
The auxiliary button on the remote key fob will also activate/deactivate this feature.
This feature utilizes a timer function option to turn the work light off after a set amount of time.
